channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Illustrator CC
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Illustrator CC

item.title: CVE-2020-3713|2024-08-04T07:44:50.262Z -- adobe -- adobe%20illustrator%20cc
item.description: Adobe Illustrator CC versions 24.0 and earlier have a memory corruption vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to arbitrary code execution.
